blocks.passage: Mike has a busy and active life. He does well at school and (1)_____ in many clubs like basketball and chess. He is also a member of the school's community projects, where he (2)_____ with other teenagers and learns new (3)_____. He has many classes, but he can still manage his studies well. Mike is also an active member in his class forum. He and his friends (4)_____ pictures and videos about their class activities. They also discuss their homework, their problems, and how to deal with pressure from parents, friends, and schoolwork. The most common problem they discuss is how to deal with (5)_____.
